akn:subsection.akn:heading: Transactions between plan and party in interest

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Transactions between plan and party in interest Except as provided in section 1108 of this title:
(b) Transactions between plan and fiduciary A fiduciary with respect to a plan shall not—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Transfer of real or personal property to plan by party in interest

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Transfer of real or personal property to plan by party in interest A transfer of real or personal property by a party in interest to a plan shall be treated as a sale or exchange if the property is subject to a mortgage or similar lien which the plan assumes or if it is subject to a mortgage or similar lien which a party-in-interest placed on the property within the 10-year period ending on the date of the transfer.
